description: Container with N collapsible sections, each rendered by a different sub-renderer. Ideal for multi-faceted analytical output where each facet has a different data shape. The most common pattern for complex analysis results.
ideal_for: analytical results with both structured and narrative components
instantiation_hints: 1. Define sections array with domain-specific keys and titles. 2. Assign a sub-renderer to each section based on its data shape: use mini_card_list for arrays of objects, chip_grid for tag-like collections, prose_block for narrative text, key_value_table for metadata. 3. Configure each sub-renderer with the correct field names from the engine's output schema. 4. Set expand_first=true for the most important section.
